website_summaries.verdict: Myfox's camera is pretty good, although there are better options out there -- and the whole system is seriously overpriced. Don't get it.
pros: Myfox's "IntelliTag" door/window uses vibration sensors to distinguish between a knock and a forced entry
cons: At $478, the Myfox Smart Home Security System is very expensive and it doesn't offer all that much

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind & easy to ontrol - highly recommended ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied by the quality and simplicity of this alarm system. Additionally, myfox customer service is very helpful and responsive. I have two small dogs that I often check in on through the camera. I rest easy knowing I will receive updates on my iPhone and watch immediately when an alarm is triggered. Although I don't take advantage of the subscription cloud video service, I highly recommend the complete system. It's easy to install and provides the right amount of peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Priceless Piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for!!! Works in great combination with the MyFox camera I already had. Gives great piece of mind knowing the VERY LOUD siren will activate with the camera's motion detection and I will receive an instant text and email of the event.
customer_reviews.author: HJT

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price $55
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price $55. But you need to know you have to hard reset this device every time if you failed the set up.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Douhou
customer_reviews.text: Bonjour, mon link ne fonctionne plus il ne s'allume plus plus précisément dite moi comment faire pour pouvoir l'envoyer en garantie
customer_reviews.author: DOUHOU

customer_reviews.title: Great starter system...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! The Myfox system is smart looking and easy to set up. The equipment is high quality, and not cheaply made. The basic system comes with these components: siren (wireless), key fob, intellitag (sensor) and a link (wireless internet connection hub). Set up is easy, and starts first with downloading the app. There are NO WIRES to string, making it very easy to set up just about anywhere. And there are no fees associated with using the security system, so you buy it once, and that's it. This is a great starter system. I'm really toying with adding the camera (comes separately) to my setup.
customer_reviews.author: J. Worth

customer_reviews.title: MyFox + Alexa (Amazon Echo) + IFTTT
customer_reviews.text: This home alarm system has an excellent feature (via IFTTT.com) to control it via voice. Its possible to tell Alaxa to trigger night mode and then have it auto deactivate when Alexa plays wake-up alarm in the am. The sensor is capable to detect vibrations in addition to "open" actions and its sensitivity can be adjusted, in other words triggering the alarm before anyone enters. The key fob and sensor worked as advertised. Design and quality is also very polished, everything has been thought through from the app experience to the hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad Kofman

customer_reviews.title: The Myfox Home Alarm is a nice system that's easy to set up and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: The Myfox Home Alarm is a nice system that's easy to set up and easy to use. The only hard time I had was deciding where to put the one sensor. There should be at least 2 or 3 for each door. I love the key fob idea, but it's one extra thing I don't need hanging on my keychain. And it's not needed since there is an app where you can control everything. I love all of the options and add-ons. I'll definitely be buying the camera.
customer_reviews.author: SciFiChick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: MyFox BU0201 Smart Home Alarm is not to be overlooked. I was so skeptical about a technology that could be this sensitive and likely stop a break in before it can happen. I was shocked at how easy this was to set up and get going right away. The price, for what this provides, is excellent. It may help you to sleep better or feel okay with the kids home alone after school. It's a good investment. I am going to keep playing with the system and I may buy another for a gift to someone who refuses to use any type of system!
customer_reviews.author: sunday

customer_reviews.title: Complicated, extremely expensive, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The most complicated useless expensive product anyone could ever buy. Absolutely useless and waste of money. The app is no good and not user friendly
customer_reviews.author: A Waheed

customer_reviews.title: Feel More Secure at Night
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this home alarm just to make myself feel more secure at night. However, we have a large home and installed it in our master bedroom. But it helps me feel a little more safe in this area of our home. I like the idea of preventing break-ins. A little vibration will trigger the alarm. Next I'd like to order the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Taylor

product_meta.title: Myfox Home Alarm Starter Pack (Wi-Fi, Wireless Smart Home Security System, iOS & Android)
product_meta.description:
Style:Home AlarmThe Myfox Home Alarm is the only smart home security system that catches the intruders BEFORE they can break into your home. It triggers the siren while the doors are still closed and your home is safe and sound, thanks to a door & window smart sensor that can tell the difference between normal events and a break-in attempt.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
At Myfox, we’ve worked to go beyond standard security measures to create a system that brings peace of mind to families - knowing their homes, possessions and loved ones are safe - without costly recurring bills or the need for professional installation, unlike complicated traditional systems.
feature_bullets: Door/window smart sensor: Vibration analysis to catch the intruders before they can break into your home
Proactive Security: The 110dB siren sounds while the doors are still closed and your house is safe and sound
Easy To Use: System installs in 15 minutes from your smartphone
Hands-free Disarming: The Bluetooth Key Fob automatically recognizes users and disarms the alarm
No contract 24/7 Professional Monitoring: Through a click in the app, get a team of professional operators to watch over your home 24/7. $9.99/month, no commitments, no hassle

specifications.Included Components: Wireless Smart Home Alarm Security System
